overview: In Oliena, Sardinia, local legends seem to have disappeared from peopleâ€™s memories. But the songs, the olive trees, and the fires of San Giovanni evoke them powerfully. Filmmaker Myriam Raccah thus decides to re-enact some of these stories with the help of the villagers, creating a marvellous fresco that unleashes the magic of storytelling and cinema.
title: Domus de janas
